name: Lidded Bowl (vase cassolette)
maker: Mounts attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire, Sèvres Manufactory
description: Lidded Bowl (vase cassolette); Mounts attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire (French, 1751 - 1843, master 1772), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Paris, France; about 1785; Hard-paste porcelain with a bleu nouveau ground color and gilt bronze mounts; rouge griotte marble; 37.5 x 34.3 x 26 cm (14 3/4 x 13 1/2 x 10 1/4 in.); 73.DI.77.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
